name: NSScroller.UsableParts
desc: These constants specify which parts of the scroller are visible.

items.name: case noScrollerParts
items.desc: Specifies that the scroller has neither a knob nor scroll buttons, only the knob slot.

items.name: case allScrollerParts
items.desc: Specifies that the scroller has at least a knob, possibly also scroll buttons.
